scripts.deploy: npm run adjust; git checkout master; find build -type f -exec mv {} . \;;  git add -A; git commit -a -m 'deploy'; git push; git checkout develop;
scripts.nodeploy: npm run build; npm run adjust; git checkout master; find build -type f -exec mv {} . \;;
scripts.adjust: replace-in-file /static/css/ / build/**/*.html; replace-in-file /static/js/ / build/**/*.html; replace-in-file /static/media/ / build/**/*.html; replace-in-file /static/media/ / build/**/*.js; replace-in-file static/media/ / build/**/*.js
